channel.title: [317]Adding shops?!
channel.description:
Im using winterloves source and i need to add autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg before i can add shops im guessing?
the thing is i dont have those files,and i dont know how to make them...
also do i have to write some code in server.java or client.java?
please help i get errors -.-
when i tried to add shophandler to server.java this is the error i got... EDIT:nvm i fixed it

item.title: [317]Adding shops?!
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

[quote=“Ii Claw iI, post:4, topic:304075”]Just get autospawn.cfg and shops.cfg from other source. Download others source and steal from it:D You dont need client.java to make shops. Shops is rly easy thing=)[/quote]i already did that lol.but the thing is the shops dont show up and i get an error

item.title: [317]Adding shops?!
item.dc:creator: @noobsauce noobsauce
item.description:
@noobsauce wrote:

[quote=“batula, post:2, topic:304075”]go to your client.java search for wanneshop = and you will find the answer![/quote]…if i was using a source that had wanneshop i would…but im using a blank source…so i have to add wanneshop and autospawn.cfg/shops.cfg and shophandler by myself…thats what im asking for not some noob shit
